attributes.action: Devo Max for all U.K countries
attributes.additional_details: The debate on Scottish Independence has highlighted to me that serious change is needed to our political system in order to save the U.K. To this end I propose that all U.K countries are given devo max and allowed to govern their own internal affairs and a separate federal Government is created to handle foreign affairs, security etc. This would consist of a council of Ministers from all nations as well as an elected house.
